name: Dirt Racing 2 Sprint Car Game
description:
Experience the Speed, Drifting, and Fun of all-out arcade Sprint Car Racing 2!

This is not your usual old school top view racing game. Sprint Car Racing is fast paced, slide around corners just as they do in real life. Win sprint car coins to upgrade the Engine of your car, or even better purchase faster and better sprint cars. Sprint Car Racing fun to it's extreme!

SINGLE PLAYER: Choose from 10 unique speedways and 48 Cars including Sprint Cars, Midgets, Modifieds and Late Models all with unique speed and handling, engine and tyre upgrades. Race a single race or jump straight into the championship to qualify in heats and win the A-Main to become the sprint car Champion!

RACE A FRIEND: Create a race on any track and challenge your friend. Or download any of your friends races by searching for their uploads. Or if you think you're ready for the best? Go to the leader boards to download the best races uploaded by users.

FEATURES:
* 48 Cars to choose from including Sprint Cars, Late Models, Modifieds and Midgets all with unique speed and handling
* 10 Unique Speedways, you choose the amount of laps
* Choose your own car number, Difficulty Settings, Select the amount of opponents, number of laps + more
* Race Online in this multiplayer game! Upload races to send to a friend, or download your friend’s races or races from the leader boards for the ultimate sprint car experience!
* Championship mode! race the CPU to take as many points to become the Sprint Car Champion!
* Upgrades, Head into the Sprint Car Shop to spend your hard earned coins better cars! Get an Engine tune or new Tyres for better performance in the race.
* Great extra features such as a mini map, to see where you and your opponents are. Stats to see how you are progressing.
* Fast paced sprint car action, unlike many slow paced top view racing games.
* Great HD graphics and visuals
* hear your sprint car roar. Catchy music and great sounds
* Advanced AI opponents push your skills to the limit
* Regular free updates with new content always coming!
